name: Indian-encryption-policy
tagline: Thoughts on the draft National Encryption Policy
body:
## Draft National Encryption Policy
The Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY) released a [draft Encryption Policy in PDF](http://deity.gov.in/sites/upload_files/dit/files/draft%20Encryption%20Policyv1.pdf). They also released an [addendum](http://deity.gov.in/sites/upload_files/dit/files/Addendum%20-%20NEP-1_0.pdf) to the draft to clarify about what was exempt from the purview. 

![Addendum to the draft encryption policy](images/addendum-draft-encryption-policy.png)

> Everyone has time till the 16th of October to reply to the draft and share their opinions with DeitY. You can email your comments/feedback/objections etc. to [akrishnan@deity.gov.in](mailto:akrishnan@deity.gov.in).
